author: Alina Selyukh
title: How the high cost of groceries is changing what American shoppers put in their carts
description: Market researchers find that shoppers are buying more generic food brands to counter inflation, while selectively purchasing high-end food items instead of spending money eating out.

author: Wailin Wong
title: High interest rates could be creating unintended consequences for the housing market
description: High interest rates are meant to cool the economy and bring inflation down. But when they also keep the cost of houses high, it can have the opposite effect.
content: High interest rates are meant to cool the economy and bring inflation down. But when they also keep the cost of houses high, it can have the opposite effect.
